  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestContextBuilder.allowHeaderParams(boolean)
    Use RestContextBuilder.allowedHeaderParams(String)
    org.apache.juneau.rest.widget.Widget.getHtml(RestRequest)
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestResponse.getHtmlDocBuilder()
    Use HtmlDocConfig
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestContext.getLogger()
    Use RestContext.getCallLogger()
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestRequest.getLogger()
    Use standard logging APIs.
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestException.getOccurrence()
    Not used by new logging API.
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestResponse.getProperties()
    Use RestResponse.getAttributes().
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestRequest.getProperties()
    Use RestRequest.getAttributes()
    org.apache.juneau.rest.widget.Widget.getScript(RestRequest)
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestContext.getStackTraceOccurrence(Throwable)
    Not used by new logging API.
    org.apache.juneau.rest.widget.Widget.getStyle(RestRequest)
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestRequest.getWidgets()
    No replacement.
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestContext.isDebug()
    Use RestContext.getDebug().
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestContextBuilder.logger(Class<? extends RestLogger>)
    Use RestContextBuilder.callLogger(Class)
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestContextBuilder.logger(RestLogger)
    Use RestContextBuilder.callLogger(RestCallLogger)
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestResponse.prop(String, Object)
    Use RestResponse.attr(String,Object).
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestRequest.prop(String, Object)
    Use RequestAttributes.put(String, Object) or ServletRequestWrapper.setAttribute(String, Object).
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestException.setOccurrence(int)
    Not used by new logging API.
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestContextBuilder.useStackTraceHashes(boolean)
    Use RestContextBuilder.callLoggerConfig(RestCallLoggerConfig)
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestContextBuilder.widgets(Class<? extends Widget>...)
    Use HtmlDocSerializerBuilder.widgets(Class[])
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestContextBuilder.widgets(Widget...)
    Use HtmlDocSerializerBuilder.widgets(HtmlWidget[])
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestContextBuilder.widgetsReplace(Class<? extends Widget>...)
    Use HtmlDocSerializerBuilder.widgetsReplace(Class[])
    org.apache.juneau.rest.RestContextBuilder.widgetsReplace(Widget...)
    Use HtmlDocSerializerBuilder.widgetsReplace(HtmlWidget[])
